original_title: Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Marcos Maidana I
overview: Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Marcos Maidana, billed as "The Moment", was a boxing welterweight championship superfight. The bout was held on May 3, in the MGM Grand Garden Arena, at the MGM Grand Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, United States, on Showtime PPV.
title: Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Marcos Maidana I
